behaviors.name: Extension Request Filtering
behaviors.description: chrome-extension:// URLs should be filtered out
behaviors.check: Service Worker should not attempt to cache browser extension requests

behaviors.name: Cache Error Resilience
behaviors.description: Cache errors should not break application functionality
behaviors.check: Application continues to work even if individual cache operations fail

behaviors.name: Modern PWA Compliance
behaviors.description: Updated meta tags eliminate deprecation warnings
behaviors.check: Uses mobile-web-app-capable instead of deprecated apple-mobile-web-app-capable only

behaviors.name: Backward Compatibility
behaviors.description: Apple devices still supported with legacy meta tags
behaviors.check: Both modern and legacy PWA meta tags present

expected_behaviors.details: Expected behaviors documented and fixes implemented

fixes_validated: PWA meta tag updated to modern standard
Cache version updated for proper deployment
All core functionality preserved after fixes
All expected Service Worker behaviors implemented

critical_issues_resolved: Browser extension interference with PWA functionality
